remarks: turbine parameters from: Ryberg, David Severin; Caglayan, Dilara Gulcin; Schmitt, Sabrina; Linßen, Jochen; Stolten, Detlef; Robinius, Martin (2019): The future of European onshore wind energy potential: Detailed distribution and simulation of advanced turbine designs. In Energy 182, pp. 1222–1238. DOI: 10.1016/j.energy.2019.06.052. - NOTE: min. specific power is not mentioned there but was used in corresponding RESkit code version
